text:
@WhiteHouse More proof I don’t need COVID-19 to feel sick...hearing Trump* has the same effect.

And Dr. Birx.

*sigh*

How quickly you sold a LIFETIME of professionalism...further proven when you danced around a social distancing question about crowded FL beaches.

#ShamefulDeborahBirx 😔
